column1: Although administrators have the option to mark learners as absent, there are times when they mistakenly select the 'unsuccessful or successful' status instead. Once a class is closed, it cannot be modified. To have the course removed from your account, please submit a ticket to the National Service Desk for assistance.
This answer can be found in the “(Instructor) Cancelling a Class” job aid. Please consult it to discover all the steps of the procedure!
